libro.author: Gambardella, Matthew
libro.descripcion: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

libro.author: Ralls, Kim
libro.descripcion: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

libro.author: Corets, Eva
libro.descripcion: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

libro.author: Corets, Eva
libro.descripcion: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

libro.author: Corets, Eva
libro.descripcion: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

libro.author: Randall, Cynthia
libro.descripcion: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

libro.author: Thurman, Paula
libro.descripcion: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

libro.author: Knorr, Stefan
libro.descripcion: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

libro.author: Kress, Peter
libro.descripcion: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

libro.author: O'Brien, Tim
libro.descripcion: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

libro.author: O'Brien, Tim
libro.descripcion: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

libro.author: Galos, Mike
libro.descripcion: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.
